app.home.callToAction: Click here to check affected map
app.home.title: Put your health in first place
app.home.subtitle: We have developed an application to help you take care of your health and who you love in the COVID19 pandemic.
app.register.step1.title: Help the community, please answer few questions about your health to see our map.
app.register.step1.question: Are you infected with COVID-19?
app.register.step2a.title: Tell us more about your symptoms
app.register.step2b.title: Tell us more about your last 2 weeks
app.register.step2c.title: Tell us more about your symptoms
app.register.step3.title: Help the community, please answer few questions about your health to see our map.
app.register.question.contact: Did you have meet someone that has infected in last days?
app.register.question.quarantine: How many days have you been in quarantine?
app.register.question.symptoms1: Check the symptoms that you have at moment:
app.register.question.symptoms2: Check the symptoms that you had or have during the infection:
app.monitor.step1.title: Insert your phone number and activate the SOS notification to alert your family and friends!
app.monitor.step2.title: Insert the token that you received in SMS
app.monitor.step3.title: Please, insert 5 phone numbers that will receive the notification if your health get worst!
